thread.title: Christopher Baude
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Christopher Baude

author: Christopher Baude
title: Christopher Baude
text:
Hi all, Arnie K was of great help to me after waiting in the line for about 1 minute. I asked him to wipe out my site and we had a long discussion whether he should do it with fire or by nuking it from the orbit. At this stage I was quite tired of the site and my manager had been nagging on me for the past days to "get that site out of Googles index" and with the help of Arnie I managed to blew it out of the stratosphere.
Top Tip of The Day: Nuke it from the orbit.
